sage.networking.client

Class AbstractGameConnectionClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.networking.AbstractGameConnection
      • sage.networking.client.AbstractGameConnectionClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameConnectionClient, IGameConnection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameConnectionClient

    public abstract class AbstractGameConnectionClient
extends AbstractGameConnection
implements IGameConnectionClient
    Abstract class to define the protected methods necessary for a game connection client.
    Author:
    Kyle Matz
